synopsis.text:
Tohruâ€™s journey with the Soumas has reached its one-year milestone, and her bond with Yuki, Kyo, and Shigure has only deepened. As she delves further into the lives of the Souma family, she uncovers a darker side to their mysterious curse. Meanwhile, Yuki finds himself surrounded by peculiar individuals, chosen to be his chief subordinates on the Student Council. Motoko, the president of Yuki's fan club, grapples with her own feelings as she witnesses Yuki's transformation.

As summer approaches, Tohru is invited to spend her vacation with the Soumas in their holiday home. She yearns for a tranquil getaway, but the complex web of emotions and past hardships that bind her to Kyo, Yuki, and the rest of the family threatens to disrupt their peaceful time together. The impending Eternal Banquet casts a long shadow over the Zodiac members, forcing them to confront their duties alongside the unsettling head of the family, Akito Souma.

With the banquet looming and unresolved feelings resurfacing, will Tohru's life with the Soumas remain unscathed, or will she find herself entangled in a situation she cannot escape?
